children.title: Size l
children.text: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure, data storage services, and ML and development tools. Using these technologies proven by time and Yandex's experience, everyone can develop and continuously improve their own cutting-edge digital services and apps.
children.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then. Both in total revenue and in terms of its customer base: more than 10 thousand companies now use our services every day.
